OOC: Yo, I'm sorry if I offended YOU, rAuq man, but if you looked at the ma=
il, Dewboy did something completely unnecessary and mean. He never even nee=
ded to make a correction there, much less through the group. Just making my=
self heard, owner, sir. - _ -.

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: Jeff=

  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Tuesday, September 17, 2002 1:08 AM
 =
 Subject: Re: OOC: Two years ago....


  Kyle wasn't being stupid faggot, a=
nd I don't find what he said 
  disrespectful. He wasn't even wasn't even t=
aking a shot at Airly. 
  Correcting someone's english spelling/grammar is =
hardly an insult, 
  and I have no clue how one could be considered an idio=
t for that. I 
  help Airly with her grammar sometimes too, and that doesn'=
t make me 
  an idiot, so it obviously doesn't make Kyle one either.

  Tho=
ugh "Long live the NBWRPG" is more correct than "Long life to 
  NBWRPG", b=
ut both are acceptable in that we understand the ultimate 
  idea being pre=
sented. Essentially, there's no point in arguing or 
  petty name calling, =
so cut it out, and please don't do it again.
